last_episode_to_air.name: Sodom and Gomorrah
last_episode_to_air.overview: One man discovers hard evidence for Sodom, the Bible's original City of Sin.

name: Secrets of the Bible
overview: Archaeologists, historians and amateur adventurers search for evidence of the Bible's mysteries.

episodes.name: The Staff of Moses
episodes.overview: The staff of Moses created some of the most astonishing miracles in the Bible. One man thinks he knows where it is. The story of how the staff got there could be another miracle itself.

episodes.name: The Parting of the Red Sea
episodes.overview: Two investigators set out to find the location of the Parting of the Red Sea.

episodes.name: The Fall of Jericho
episodes.overview: Archaeologist Dr. Bryant Wood believes he has found proof of the Battle of Jericho.

episodes.name: The Turin Shroud
episodes.overview: Is the Turin Shroud real or a fake? An Italian Professor believes he has the answer.

episodes.name: Tudor Parfitt and the Lost Tribes of Israel
episodes.overview: Professor Tudor Parfitt claims to have located an African tribe of black Jews called the Lemba whose roots can be traced back to the Jews of the Old Testament.

episodes.name: The Real Exodus
episodes.overview: For thousands of years, people have wondered about the greatest story in the Old Testament--The Exodus. This is the story of Sir Colin Humphreysâ€™ journey to find the real route of the Exodus and the true mountain of God.

episodes.name: The Great Flood
episodes.overview: The Great Flood is the most apocalyptic story in the Old Testament, but so far no concrete evidence of it has been found. Now two American oceanographers, Bill Ryan and Walter Pitman, set out to solve the mystery.

episodes.name: The Stone of Jacob
episodes.overview: Author Adrian Gilbert traces the historical path of the Stone of Jacob and answers questions regarding the ancient artifact's authenticity.

episodes.name: The Temple of Solomon Mystery
episodes.overview: Questions arise surrounding the authenticity of the Jehoash Tablet, a religious artifact containing an ancient inscription.

episodes.name: The Tower of Babel
episodes.overview: David Rohl looks for the location of the Tower of Babel.

episodes.name: The Holy Grail
episodes.overview: A man thinks that he has solved the mystery of the Holy Grail.

episodes.name: The Ten Plagues of Egypt
episodes.overview: Two scientists investigate the mystery of The Ten Plagues of Egypt. Dr John S Marr examines the medical accuacy behind myth, while molecular biologist Siro Trevisanato looks for one single cause to explain all ten plagues.

episodes.name: Sodom and Gomorrah
episodes.overview: One man discovers hard evidence for Sodom, the Bible's original City of Sin.
